thread.title: Lovely place to stay in Paris
thread.title_full: Lovely place to stay in Paris - Review of Hotel Basss by HappyCulture, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Rachel O
title: Lovely place to stay in Paris
text: We have just returned from our second stay at this hotel, the first one being in December 2015. This is quite a basic hotel with small bedrooms and shower rooms, but it is clean and comfortable with friendly staff and in an amazing location. We were there to celebrate my 50th birthday and requested a room with a view, and were therefore given a room right up on the top floor with a view of the Eiffel Tower. I suspect that not many of the rooms share this view and I am very grateful that they made the effort for me - it certainly was an added bonus.
